smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function constructQueryMap is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function testLockCheckApi_lockedMessage is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function testLockCheckApi_unlockedMessage is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class TimecryptUnitTests is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function onPageScrollStateChanged is nested too deeply.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'CreateMessageActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: ThrowingExceptionsWithoutMessageOrCause
smells.description: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

instances.message: A call to the default constructor of an exception was detected. Instead one of the constructor overloads should be called. This allows to provide more meaningful exceptions.

smells.name: VariableNaming

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of CreateMessageActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of TimecryptViewPager.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in ((1f / 4f + percent) % 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (1f / 4f + percent) % 1
Parentheses in (throw IllegalStateException("What's this case? $mapPick")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: throw IllegalStateException("What's this case? $mapPick")
